text: Khawaja Ahmad Tariq Rahim is a Pakistani politician who has served as the Governor of Punjab, Pakistan. Previously, he also had been the Federal Minister. Born to Mian family of Baghbanpura, Khawaja received his early education from Aitchison College, Lahore. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Governors of Punjab, Pakistan Category:Aitchison College alumni Category:Mian family Category:Federal ministers of Pakistan
title: Khawaja Tariq Rahim
